rules.description: Linux - Avoid accidental Cmd+h/q/w
Linux - RCmd+RShift to navigate apps
Linux - Ctrl+abcefgiklmnopqrstvxyz as Cmd+abcefgiklmnopqrstvxyz outside terminals
Linux - Ctrl+Backspace & Ctrl+w to delete words outside terminals
Linux - Ctrl+d/u to scroll page outside terminals
Linux - Ctrl+Shift+c/v/q/w as Cmd+c/v/q/w
Linux - Ctrl+Shift+[] to switch adjacent tabs
Linux - Avoid accidental Cmd+q/w
Linux - RCmd+RShift to navigate apps
Linux - Ctrl+abcefgiklmnopqrstvxyz as Cmd+abcefgiklmnopqrstvxyz outside terminals
Linux - Ctrl+Backspace & Ctrl+w to delete words outside terminals
Linux - Ctrl+d/u to scroll page outside terminals
Linux - Ctrl+Shift+c/v/q/w as Cmd+c/v/q/w
Linux - Ctrl+Shift+[] to switch adjacent tabs
Minimal52 - Esc/LCtrl, Tab/Fn, and LCmd/Enter dual functions
Minimal52 - RCmd+h/j/k/l as arrow keys
Minimal52 - Fn+number row for media functions
Minimal52 - Top right cluster
Minimal52 - RCmd+alpha as alpha
Minimal52 - RCmd+Space to navigate terminal
